name: George Nees, 8-ecke - alternative version 1
description: Build opon the original by adding opacity changes and more chaos.

name: George Nees, 8-ecke - alternative version 2
description: Breaks the grid of the original and adds change in stroke width to add a sense of depth.

name: George Nees, 8-ecke - alternative version 3
description: Created a filled shape from the random lines, giving it a camouflage look.

name: George Nees, Schotter - Original recreation
description: Made using grids, randomness, and percentages.

name: George Nees, Schotter - alternative version 1
description: Plays with the scale and creates a more 3D effect on the shapes.

name: George Nees, Schotter - alternative version 2
description: Implements perlin noise to the grid and adds a 'motion blur' like effect.

name: Erick Calderon, Chromie Squiggle - Original recreation
Erick Calderon, Chromie Squiggle - alternative version 1
description: Adds incremental increases in size and alternates color to create a snake-like effect.

name: Erick Calderon, Chromie Squiggle - alternative version 2
description: Creates a simple landscape from 3 seperate perlin noise vertex shapes.

name: Erick Calderon, Chromie Squiggle - alternative version 3
description: Reused noise on a grid, inspired by A. Michael Noll, Ninety computer-generated sinusoids with linearly increasing period.

name: Tyler Hobbs, Fidenza - Original recreation
description: Three-dimentional flow field generative algorithm. Recreation of the core algorithm.

name: Tyler Hobbs, Fidenza - alternative version 1
description: Creates horns using the same algorithm with added changes in size and random placement.

name: Tyler Hobbs, Fidenza - alternative version 2
description: Changes the particle values and changes their size to create a 'mesh' or 'fluid' like effect.

name: Tone.js experiement - 1
description: Sine waveform, press and hold to play.

name: Tone.js experiement - 2
description: Randomly triggered notes, experimenting with octaves and reverb.

name: Tone.js experiement - 3
description: Based on Erick Calderon - Chromie Squiggle, added sound based on Y level.
